item.title: FourHead
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: One PC, Four Users "A reseach group from UFPR university in Brazil, C3SL has managed to make one Linux box run four terminals at the same time. That means four mice, keyboards, displays and users with just one CPU. The way they managed to do that can be found at the FourHead project webpage. The fact that one computer science laboratory can suport up to 60 users whit only 15 PCs is really attractive for low-resource groups and countries." (Link courtesy of Slashdot)
